section.section:
Of the 10 Commission members:
5 shall be appointed by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, with the approval of the Governor; and
5 shall be appointed by the Mayor of Baltimore City.

text.section: Each member must be a Maryland war veteran.

section.section: The term of a member is 5 years.
The terms of a member are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Commission on October 1, 1984.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
